doc.title: The Glory of America
doc.plot: 'The Glory of America' was much more than a spectacular celebration of our nation's birth and our Independence Day - it was more than a tribute to Christian martyrs and heroes - more than a revelation of our nation's great Christian heritage! Jan Crouch and her incredible Drama Cast and Crew, through this beautiful 4-night dramatic portrayal of His-Story (from Calvary to America to you and me), imparted the vision of God's Plan for us today! ... The first night included scenes representing the essential message of the Gospel - Jesus' death, His Triumph over Satan, His Resurrection! ... Bill & Renee Morris, Alvin Slaughter, Steve Brock, Tata Vega, Betty Jean Robinson, LaVerne & Edith Tripp, Chris Holloway, Karen Wheaton, Danny York, Randy & Renee Clark, Carman, E.V. Hill, Shirley Caesar, a 350-member cast, and Jan are among the long list of wonderful speakers, musical artists, dancers, cast, crew, and helpers, who poured their heart and soul into this production, ... .
